product_name: CamelBak eddy Bite Valve and Straw - Package of 2
long_description: Keep your CamelBak eddy(TM) or Groove(TM) water bottle in tip-top shape with this package of replacement Big Bite(TM) valves and straws. 1-piece silicone bite valves prevent leaks; new design provides faster flow than previous versions. 2 replacement straws let you sip without tipping your bottle. Package includes 2 bite valves and 2 straws for CamelBak eddy and Groove water bottles (sold separately).
short_description: Keep your CamelBak eddy(TM) or Groove(TM) water bottle in tip-top shape with this package of replacement Big Bite(TM) valves and straws.
